mapper.select: SELECT stockPlanSum.DIST_MONTH as distMonth, stockPlanSum.LGCS_CODE as areaCode, stockPlanSum.SUPP_CODE as supplierCode, stockPlanSum.PD_STOCK_TYPE as planType, stockPlanSum.HALF_CODE as halfCode, SUM(stockPlanSum.NEW_PLAN_NUM) as sumPlanNum, SUM(stockPlanSum.ORIG_PLAN_NUM) as sumOrigPlanNum FROM ds_pd_virtual_stock_plan stockPlanSum WHERE stockPlanSum.DIST_MONTH=#{distMonth} AND stockPlanSum.LGCS_CODE=#{areaCode} AND stockPlanSum.SUPP_CODE=#{supplierCode} AND stockPlanSum.DEL_FLG = 0 GROUP BY stockPlanSum.DIST_MONTH ,stockPlanSum.LGCS_CODE ,stockPlanSum.SUPP_CODE ,stockPlanSum.PD_STOCK_TYPE ,stockPlanSum.HALF_CODE

SELECT stockActualSum.DIST_MONTH as distMonth, stockActualSum.LGCS_CODE as areaCode, stockActualSum.SUPP_CODE as supplierCode, stockActualSum.PD_STOCK_TYPE as planType, stockActualSum.HALF_CODE as halfCode, SUM(stockActualSum.NEW_ACTUAL_NUM) as sumActualNum FROM ds_pd_virtual_stock_actual stockActualSum WHERE stockActualSum.DIST_MONTH=#{distMonth} AND stockActualSum.LGCS_CODE=#{areaCode} AND stockActualSum.SUPP_CODE=#{supplierCode} AND stockActualSum.DEL_FLG = 0 GROUP BY stockActualSum.DIST_MONTH ,stockActualSum.LGCS_CODE ,stockActualSum.SUPP_CODE ,stockActualSum.PD_STOCK_TYPE ,stockActualSum.HALF_CODE

SELECT stockPlanSum.DIST_MONTH as distMonth, stockPlanSum.LGCS_CODE as areaCode, stockPlanSum.SUPP_CODE as supplierCode, stockPlanSum.PD_STOCK_TYPE as planType, SUM(stockPlanSum.NEW_PLAN_NUM) as sumSumPlanNum, SUM(stockPlanSum.ORIG_PLAN_NUM) as sumSumOrigPlanNum FROM ds_pd_virtual_stock_plan stockPlanSum WHERE stockPlanSum.DIST_MONTH=#{distMonth} AND stockPlanSum.LGCS_CODE=#{areaCode} AND stockPlanSum.SUPP_CODE=#{supplierCode} AND stockPlanSum.DEL_FLG = 0 GROUP BY stockPlanSum.DIST_MONTH ,stockPlanSum.LGCS_CODE ,stockPlanSum.SUPP_CODE ,stockPlanSum.PD_STOCK_TYPE

SELECT stockActualSum.DIST_MONTH as distMonth, stockActualSum.LGCS_CODE as areaCode, stockActualSum.SUPP_CODE as supplierCode, stockActualSum.PD_STOCK_TYPE as planType, SUM(stockActualSum.NEW_ACTUAL_NUM) as sumSumActualNum FROM ds_pd_virtual_stock_actual stockActualSum WHERE stockActualSum.DIST_MONTH=#{distMonth} AND stockActualSum.LGCS_CODE=#{areaCode} AND stockActualSum.SUPP_CODE=#{supplierCode} AND stockActualSum.DEL_FLG = 0 GROUP BY stockActualSum.DIST_MONTH ,stockActualSum.LGCS_CODE ,stockActualSum.SUPP_CODE ,stockActualSum.PD_STOCK_TYPE
